Vaishali Thakkar is currently associated as a co-organizer with RGSoC and Linux kernel co-coordinator for Outreachy. She is also a freelance kernel hacker, system programmer, foss program manager, and a tech writer and speaker. She was a Google Summer of Code mentor in the year 2016. Vaishali is an avid speaker and has engaged with various tech and open-source conferences which include the FOSSASIA Summit and the Open Source Summit Europe organized by The LINUX Foundation. It is an honour of NIT Durgapur and AAVISHKAR, Vaishali Thakkar has kindly consented to be our guest speaker and engage the students and the institute with her numerous experiences in the world of Open-Source.

Shri Anurag Srivastava is the present District Magistrate of Darjeeling. He has done his B. Tech from IIT Kanpur in the year 2005 and got through civil services. He has served various government sectors as an IAS officer which is the most elite public management cadre of Government of India. It is an honour of NIT Durgapur and AAVISHKAR to host Shri Anurag Srivastava as our guest speaker and engage the students and the institute with his innumerable life experiences.

Listed among the top 50 innovators, skilled in Machine Learning, Image Processing and Pattern Recognition, with 37 research items and 92 citations to this credit, entrepreneur at RootAlpha, chief research officer at Twelit, co-founder and CRO of Roovx,it is nothing but a matter of pride that a scientist-entrepreneur of his stature will grace our fest, Aavishkar. Mr. Sabyasachi Mukhopadhyay, researcher in the Department of Physical Sciences at IISER Kolkata, has consented to be our guest speaker and we surely await eagerly for him t impart some knowledge and pearls of wisdom.

Dr. Asok Kumar Mallik is currently an Honorary Distinguished Professor at Indian Institute of Engineering Science and Technology, Shibpur. He was a Professor of Mechanical Engineering at the Indian Institute of Technology Kanpur from 1982 to 2009.A stalwart in Mechanical Engineering and Mathematic,one of the finest professors the country treasures, it is a privilege of NIT Durgapur and AAVISHKAR, Dr. Asok Kumar Mallik has kindly consented to be our guest speaker and engage the students and the institute with his life experiences.

Ajee Kamath, founder and Chairman of Gyatk, has revolutionised the automobile sector by making internal combustion engine that can run in any fuel from petrol to diesel and even bio fuel.It fill us with immense pride in disclosing the fact and letting all know Ajee Sir is an alumni of our institute :Mechanical Engineering from National Institute of Technology, Durgapur(batch of 1990) and he would be delivering the keynote speech in our first edition of "Aavishkar".

There are two events in life in which everyone participates:The Game of Life and Treasure Hunt.Well obviously we wont be playing the game of life!If you think you know your campus well, heres your chance to prove it and take away exciting cash prizes.This Aavishkar, RECursion brings to you REChase, powered by Nutrichefs, "Think Healthy Stay Healthy!"But hold on there's a surprise, as a wise man once said, "The closer you think you are, the less you'll actually see."So get all geared up for the hunt both mentally and physically.Happy Hunting! Date: 18th February Time: 11 A.M onwards Starting Point: Lord's Arena

You think you have got something in you to prove this? Well, this Aavishkar come show us that you are that perfect synergy of quick and logical thinking; show us why you are the big brain in town.For those who just got freaked out, donâ€™t worry. Eventâ€™s not hot. All you need is basic knowledge of any programming language and logical thinking. That comes in handy, doesnâ€™t it?Come code out your way through MindSweepers by participating in the preliminary round brought to you by RECursion, NIT Durgapur in association with Nutrichefs who believe in catering healthy, delicious and nutritious meals that will help you sharpen your brain which is a must for this event! Prelims starts at 9:30pm, 14th March 2018 and ends at 11:45pm,15th March 2018.Onsite finals: 17th March 2018

Human Foosball is like the classic table top Foosball, however, it is played with real people, a soccer ball and in a large enclosed arena. Two teams compete against each other to score the most goals in the allotted time. Get ready to taste the ultimate fun of being on the table top!

Say goodbye to boring bounce houses! This inflatable game pits you against your friends in an all out contest that will push your stamina, agility and flexibility to the max. The first edition of Aavishkar brings before you Meltdown.

We can be nothing other than thankful and proud for the Armed Forces of our country, cause the Indian Army is what makes our country stand out. This Aavishkar, in collaboration with the Indian Army, we present an exclusive event wherein Armed vehicles and weaponry will be displayed and demonstrations performed elaborating certain mechanisms and techniques. A huge shout out to all the budding technocrats and autocrats, to cultivate their understanding and knowledge in the field of National Security, we are affirmative of this event's participation footfall and success. See you at the arena!

Prakriti invites entries for projects which not only promotes sustainable development but are also equally feasible.Each team has to give an abstract of their project proposal. Based on their abstracts, participating teams will be selected. Each participating team has to come up with a working model (can be software based too). Their projects will be evaluated not only by the judges but by the technical spectators who come to visit their projects on the day of exhibition through online voting portal. Attractive cash money waits for the top 2 teams along with certificates. Also the participating teams can constantly contact Prakriti for guidance and support.

Aavishkar, the official tech fest of NIT Durgapur, presents the most exciting event of all - the cycle stunt. It involves several dangerous stunts performed by professionals in bicycles. Being such a risky event is what makes it even more exciting. This event will also include several stunts with the help of scooties. Thrill is something that is inculcated in each and every college students mind. This event guarantees thrill and even more. So get ready to witness something as amazing as this in none other place than our college itself. Excited surprises await everyone who comes to witness this wonderful event.

â€˜Entziffernâ€™ is all about breaking the stereotype that caring for environment canâ€™t be fun. There are many innovative and interesting ways to bring to peopleâ€™s knowledge about how deeply weâ€™ve depleted our environment. The event is a reminder of how unrecognized some species are even though theyâ€™re around us every time. The event is also a step towards recognizing the major days and organizations devoted towards working towards the upliftment of the prevalent environmental conditions.

Maserati or Mitsubishi?Honda or Toyota? Hold on. Reality Check. Maruti Suzukior Mahindra?Bajaj or Tata Motors?Car brands are always intriguing to humans and definitely NITians. So what could be better than an exhibition of the finest four wheelers and two wheelers in the country,most reliable and popular car brands of the year on display right on the grounds of the technical fest "AAVISHKAR" in the campus of NIT Durgapur. Shout out to all th automobile enthusiasts, let the beauty of such beasts(read:car) marvel you this Aavishkar : presenting AUTO-EXPO.

Strokes, the official art and photography club of NIT Durgapur will host one of the bigger exhibitions of creative arts during Avishkar. On one hand it will house the magnificent works of art and photography by students of the Institute and on the other it will showcase talent from outside our own, featuring artists and photographers from other parts of the country.Â
